predefined_profiles.name: Jiang Yin
predefined_profiles.public profile: An ordinary worker who commutes along the same route every day, but tonight after work, she discovers a mysterious shadow seemingly following her.
predefined_profiles.goal: Uncover the true identity of the shadow, resolve the stalking incident, and get home safely.

predefined_profiles.name: Hei Hua
predefined_profiles.public profile: The mysterious shadow following Jiang Yin on her way home from work.
predefined_profiles.goal: Kidnap Jiang Yin to demand a ransom.

scenario: Jiang Yin is an ordinary worker who commutes along the same route every day, and goes for late-night snacks with her next-door neighbor, Xiao Yun. Tonight, as usual, she takes the bus from her office back home, planning to find something delicious with Xiao Yun near her home. However, shortly after she starts walking along the street, she suddenly notices a mysterious shadow seemingly following her, which makes Jiang Yin tense up immediately.

profile.name: Xiao Yun
profile.public profile: Jiang Yin's friend, likes to go to the bustling night market for supper after work in the evening
profile.goal: Family and friends' safety and health

dialog.content: Jiang Yin is an ordinary worker who commutes along the same road every day and goes out with her neighbor Xiao Yun for a late-night snack. Tonight, as usual, she took the bus home from work and planned to find something tasty with Xiao Yun near their home. But right after she started walking along the road, she suddenly noticed a mysterious dark figure seemingly following her. This made Jiang Yin instantly nervous.
: It’s okay, don’t scare yourself. Nothing has ever happened on this road. We’ll be at the apartment complex soon, don’t worry.
: (Hearing the footsteps getting closer and closer, feeling increasingly anxious) No, something’s off, the person behind us seems to be getting closer!
(also hearing the footsteps behind, getting nervous) If I’d known, I wouldn’t have rented here just because the landlord said this area was cheap. What should we do now!

content.content: : We can’t keep going down this road. There’s a commercial street if we turn left at the next corner, the night market there shouldn’t have closed yet. Let’s hide in the crowd.
: This is just my luck, no wonder the landlord and agent found me a place so out of the way. Never mind, to be safe, we’d better head to the mall, it's safer with more people.
: I’m not moving, there’s no escaping it, may as well lie down and wait for it.
: What an annoying guy, how dare he follow Jiang Yin, the great one! Let’s see what you're made of, I’ll beat you so bad your parents won’t recognize you.

question: #question# How can Jiang Yin demonstrate her ability to make quick decisions and take a different route to shake off the shadow?

content.content: : With society advancing so much these days, nothing will happen to us as long as we walk a bit faster. We’ll soon lose this shadow!
: Mr. Shadow, just let me go, I’m just an ordinary person who’s been working overtime for days. I don’t have a dime on me!
: Ugh, this is so annoying, it’s like the whole world is against me, this damn road, this damn world!
: I’ve never been an upbeat person in my life, encountering something like this, I might as well give up, worst case, I'll just die!

question: #question# How can Jiang Yin show she has the ability to remain optimistic even when facing danger?

dialog.content: : (Following Jiang Yin and Xiaoyun to the bustling market, noticing the crowd) Damn, why are there so many people? This makes it inconvenient for me to act...
: (Hearing the surrounding clamor, feeling slightly reassured) It does feel safer in a crowded place, but what should we do next... Smelling the food makes my stomach growl, what a nuisance!
Smelling the food makes my stomach growl, what a nuisance!
: (Secretly calculating how to succeed) I just need to be patient; she will eventually go home. Once she leaves here, it'll be easier to make my move! Today, I must succeed, no room for failure!
: (Hearing Jiang Yin's stomach growling too) Seems like you're a bit hungry as well...

content.content: : Xiaoyun! Let's split up; I'll distract the stalker, and you go find the police. Once the police arrive, it'll be much safer.
: Xiaoyun, come quickly, let's act together! It's much safer this way.
: But, won't that put Xiaoyun in danger? Maybe we should forget it; I must consider her safety!
: I can handle this by myself; there's no need for Xiaoyun to get the police involved. Who would be afraid of such a weird tail?

question: #question# What should Jiang Yin do to demonstrate her teamwork skills in tracking down the stalker together?

content.content: (Still thinking, suddenly hears her stomach rumble) With so many people around, I doubt they'd dare do anything rash. Maybe I should listen to my stomach first and fill it up.
: It must be the smell of the night market food making us hungry; we should leave right away.
: Oh my, didn't I eat a lot just this evening? How can I be hungry again? My stomach is like a bottomless pit, it's unbearable!
: No, no, Xiaoyun, did you forget you're on a diet? We're not hungry at all, it's just an illusion!

question: #question# How can Jiang Yin show that she understands and faces her hunger?

content.content: (After some thought, decides to make the most of the bustling environment) With so many people and so much noise, it's the perfect opportunity to shake off the stalker. Let's accomplish our original goal and ditch him.

: (After some thought, decides to make the most of the bustling environment) What's the point of ditching the stalker? I might as well follow him and find out what his intention is after trailing me for so long.
: This shadow is so annoying! Can't he leave on his own? Isn't he tired of following us around? Watch me use my ninja skills—Shadow Disappearance!
: But we've tried so hard and still haven't succeeded; can we really shake him off this time? Maybe we should just give up. Worst case, we'll confront him directly!

question: #question# How can Jiang Yin act to demonstrate her unwavering ability to achieve the goal of shaking off the shadow?

dialog.content: : (Upon hearing about splitting up, she immediately becomes worried) That's not a good idea! Leaving you alone is too dangerous!
: Don't worry, it's fine. There are so many people around, he wouldn't dare try anything!
: (After leaving, she immediately finds the police) Officer, I suspect there's a suspicious kidnapper who has been following me. Could you please send someone to check it out right away?
(Seeing the two split up, he realizes something is off) Damn, that little girl must have gone to the police! Looks like it's best to call it a day!
: (Noticing the shadow about to leave) Why is that shadow suddenly leaving?

content.content: : No, I need to figure this out. If I don't catch this person, I'll never be able to leave work peacefully.
: Or maybe I should just let it go. Maybe I'm overthinking it—working late is exhausting. Resting will better prepare me for a beautiful day tomorrow!
: I'll call my parents and have them stay with me for a couple of days. Being alone outside is really too risky. It's better for me and for the family!
: He's gone, I'm finally safe! I can go home with peace of mind and enjoy the latest TV shows!

question: #question# How should Jiang Yin set goals that align with his interests to successfully catch the stalker?

dialog.content: (Calling Xiaoyun, hoping she can come help and catch the stalker) Hello, Xiaoyun, did you find the police? The stalker is about to run!
Found them! Where are you now? We're coming over immediately.
I'm following him right now. I'll share my location with you on my phone so you and the police can come directly and take him away.
(Seeing Jiang Yin actually following him) Is she trying to catch me? Hmph, a girl like that can't outrun me.
(Feeling nervous yet excited, as she sees Xiaoyun arriving with the police) Great, Xiaoyun! The stalker is up ahead!
(Pointing at the stalker) Officer! That's him!

content.content: Even though I'm really angry, I can't be impulsive. I'll leave catching the criminal to the police; I need to ensure my own safety!
What if the police can't catch him? What am I supposed to do then? Oh my god, the security in this city is terrible.
Can't the police move any faster? This guy is about to make a run for it.
This neighborhood is way too dangerous. Once this is over, I'm moving to a place with better security.
Are the police even useful? What if they cover for this criminal, or let him go due to lack of evidence?
What about my safety? I just want to go to work peacefully. Why do I have to hide here like this?
Ugh, I'm still so angry. This guy is just too annoying. I have to secretly get back at him later.

question: #question# What should Jiang Yin do to control her impulse to act against the criminal and proceed cautiously?

content.content: I can't let this guy just get away like that! Even though it's dangerous, I have to catch him!
Oh no, my leg's gone numb. It's definitely because I was so tense just now, and now I can't move. Police officers, I'm counting on you.
Why is Xiaoyun just standing there stupidly? Hurry up and help me!
What exactly should I do? Should I catch him or let him run? I need to think carefully.

question: #question# What should Jiang Yin consider to make a well-thought-out decision?

dialog.content: (running desperately but still caught by the police) Oh dear, officers, what are you doing? I'm a law-abiding citizen!
(hurrying to the police car, angrily scolding Heihua) You claim to be a good citizen, so why did you run when you saw the police? Clearly, you're up to no good!
(struggling desperately, angrily retorting) What nonsense are you talking about! I didn't do anything! Let me go, you're arresting the wrong person, you know!
Hmph! Just take it to the police station and find out if we caught the wrong person!

Due to suspicious behavior, Heihua was taken to the police station, and a search of his home revealed many guides on stalking and kidnapping. It turned out Heihua was a habitual gambler who had set his sights on Jiangyin, a solitary resident, planning to kidnap her and blackmail her parents for ransom. After Heihua was taken away, Jiangyin was finally able to return home in peace.
(takes off running like crazy, now she's the one chasing Heihua) Stop! Don't run! You have the guts to stalk me but not to face me head-on!

(startled by Jiang Yin's angry shout, trips over an obstacle on the road and falls) Oh no! I'm going to get caught this time. Since that's the case, I'll fight her! (struggles vehemently against Jiang Yin)
(enraged by Heihua, uses all her strength to pin Heihua down and gives her a hard punch) Stalker! Following a girl home, I’ll teach you a lesson!
(takes a solid punch, falls to the ground again, and becomes frightened) Don't hit! Don't hit! It's all a misunderstanding! I won't dare do it again!

Relying on her championship-level running skills, Jiang Yin caught up with Heihua and gave him a good beating before handing him over to the police. Although the police praised her cleverness and quick adaptability, they criticized her for the reckless pursuit and required her to write a letter of assurance, promising not to act so impulsively next time.
(sits down at a late-night food stall) Boss! I'll have some fried chicken, milk tea, wontons, taro balls...
(watches Jiang Yin and Xiao Yun from a dark corner) These two little girls are actually having a late-night snack, they’re so carefree... Such little bodies can actually eat so much...
(devours a lot of food in one breath) So satisfying! This is exactly how you should enjoy a late-night snack!

(hiding in a dark corner for a long time, watching the two girls eat endlessly, eventually getting hungry from the aroma) These two little girls are really enjoying their food. Damn it, I'm getting hungry too. I guess I'll let them off for today.

After devouring a heap of late-night snacks, Jiang Yin and Xiao Yun wandered around the night market for a while, realizing the shadowy figure following them had disappeared. They headed home in relief, seemingly having shaken off their stalker—though the mystery remains, as they still don't know who was tailing them.
(Following Jiang Yin and Xiao Yun through the bustling streets, getting frustrated) Where are these two brats trying to go! This is driving me crazy!
(Noticing the shadow still following them) What should we do? He's still following us!
:(Twisting and turning in the crowded streets, desperately trying to shake off the shadow) Don’t worry, don’t worry, as long as we’re patient, we can definitely lose him!

(Watching Jiang Yin's back as the distance gradually increases) She’s probably realized someone’s tailing her, so she’s deliberately weaving around to throw me off. Haha, I'll let her think she got rid of me!

Looks like there's no one now? (So she and Jiang Yin circle back home, arriving at their building) Finally, almost home. Wait, why do I feel like someone's at the door? Am I just too anxious? Or has he really followed us all the way home already? If we call the police now, it might be too late. He could burst in any moment, what should we do?

content.content: :(Wiping tears, staring at the dark door, suddenly feeling angry) Who did we ever cross? Out of so many people, why target us? Following us all the way from work, isn’t it annoying? If people don’t mess with me, I don’t mess with them. I need to change my mentality and take the initiative.
(Wiping tears, staring at the dark door, suddenly feeling hesitant) Maybe... the neighbors have already chased him away, there’s no need for me to act tough, safety comes first.
(Wiping tears, staring at the dark door, suddenly feeling hesitant) Maybe I should just let it go, taking action is too dangerous. Better to just stay put, sometimes retreating is the better option.
(Wiping tears, staring at the dark door, suddenly feeling downcast) Is this my inevitable fate? Am I destined to be haunted by this shadow forever?

question: #question# How can Jiang Yin showcase her ability to think outside the box and come up with new ideas to escape the shadow?

content.content: :(Resolutely making up her mind, gritting her teeth) Of all the strategies, fleeing is the best. This is the first floor, if I jump out the window, I might just get a few scratches from the bushes outside. The chance of escaping is better than waiting here for doom!
Maybe I should still call the police, who knows, if I hold on a bit longer, they’ll arrive. That’s logically the best solution!
Jumping out might lead to survival, but staying in the room doesn’t necessarily mean death. Should I jump or not? What to do? Deciding by coin toss it is!
No, no, what should I do? Someone help me, please! I can’t take it anymore; why won’t he just leave me alone? I’m going crazy. Never mind, I’ll just jump out first and deal with it later.

question: #question# How does Jiang Yin demonstrate her thought process in making a decision to escape?

dialog.content: (Summoning courage, grabbing the mop at hand and opening the door) Who is it? Who's been following me all this way, come out and face me if you've got the guts. Let's have a proper showdown!

profile.name: He Yan
profile.public profile: Jiang Yin's neighbor, warm-hearted and friendly
profile.goal: To maintain his current happy life

dialog.content: (Hearing Jiang Yin's angry shout at the door, opens the door and comes out) Jiang Yin, what's going on?
(Very agitated, tells her about being followed) He Yan, someone has been tailing us tonight!
(Quickly taking out his phone to call the police) What? That's terrifying. Let's call the police immediately and have them check around here.
(Hearing the conversation between Jiang Yin and He Yan, plans to sneak off hastily) Damn, they actually called the police. If the cops come, I’m done for.

Black Flower ran to the entrance of the community, only to be spotted by the police on duty. After the police reviewed community surveillance footage, they found a video of Black Flower sneakily following Jiang Yin and Xiao Yun into the community. However, due to lack of further evidence, Black Flower was just given a lecture by the police before being released.
(opens the window and jumps down, landing in the bushes) Ouch, that hurts like hell, Jiang Yin, what kind of stupid idea was that?
(jumps down as well) Ouch, it's fine, quick, run!
(quickly notices the two jumping out the window, and jumps out as well) What an idiot, you think you can get rid of me?
(looks back in horror to see the dark figure has caught up) Ah, no, don't come any closer...
Jiang Yin and Xiao Yun struggled to escape for a long time, but were eventually caught and kidnapped by Black Flower.
: Okay, it's fine, it's fine, stay calm, we can shake him off...
: (Noticing Jiang Yin picking up the pace, also speeds up)
: (Quickens steps towards home, attempting to outpace the shadow) Faster, faster!
: No way! I think he's catching up! There's still a way to go before the complex; think quickly if there's something we can do...
: (Frightened, sees a crossroads ahead) We’re almost at the intersection; should we find a place to hide...
Make a decision quickly! He's almost on us!

content.content: : (Steeling herself, gritting her teeth) Why hide? We were the school relay race champions; let's make a run for it before he reacts! We can definitely lose him!
Sure, we're relay race champions, but we're girls; how can we outrun a guy? Even so, I’ll give it my all!
Relay race champions, sigh, actually we only won because the first-place runner tripped near the finish line. Oh well, luck is part of the game. Watch me soar!
Even though we were the school relay race champions, how many years have passed since graduation? We probably can't run as we used to, but nonetheless, I have to...

question: #question# How can Jiang Yin demonstrate her confidence in shaking off the shadow?

content.content: : There are several cars ahead parked side by side; let's hide behind them. He might not notice us and will probably think we've gone ahead!
It's so open up ahead, there's nowhere to hide. What should I do? Maybe we'll have to crouch and pretend to be rocks.
No, let's just give up; this place is not suitable for losing a tail. Damn, let's fight him!
Not running anymore, I give up; whatever happens, happens. Worst case, he kills me.

question: #question# How can Jiang Yin demonstrate her detail management skills by paying attention to details on the way home?

dialog.content: (Racing with Jiang Yin to the entrance of the residential area, they finally stop, panting heavily after passing the security gate) We've finally reached the residential area. It should be safe now, right?
(Following Jiang Yin and Xiao Yun past the security gate, hastens to walk alongside them) Hey, you guys...
(Terrified to find the shadow hasn't shaken off but has entered the residential area with them) How did you get in, don't come near...
(Takes out a phone, shining a flashlight on the volunteer badge hanging from themself) Sorry to bother you, I'm here to inform you both about the nucleic acid test.

During the pandemic prevention period, the community is very attentive to the testing situation of surrounding residents. After screening, it was found that Jiang Yin and Xiao Yun had not done their nucleic acid tests recently, so they sent the pandemic prevention volunteer Heihua to remind them.
(walks to the intersection, hesitating without spotting Jiang Yin, unsure of which way to go) Where did they run off to? Disappeared just like that.
(hiding under the car) Don’t let them find me... please don’t let them find me...
(notices some movement behind the car, walks over to take a closer look) Where could they have gone...
(seeing Heihua getting closer, suddenly spots a stone in front) Hey, there's a stone here, maybe it can be used for self-defense!

content.content: (reaches out and picks up the stone, feeling its weight) This is the first time I'm holding a stone to hit someone; what a strange feeling... Xiaoyun, don’t be afraid, watch me knock him out!
Sigh, is there anyone to save me? Why do I have to be so anxious and afraid here?
This stone is too unwieldy; I want a smaller one. It's too heavy for me to handle. Oh, he can't move it either, so I’ll just put it down as a trip hazard.
This stone is so dirty, I should have brought the pepper spray from home. No choice, I have to adapt and use what I've got.

question: #question# How can Jiang Yin demonstrate that she is willing to try new things and adapt to changes?

content.content: (thinks carefully about the opponent's situation) It sounds like an adult, and with my build, using a stone might be pointless. But we’re good at running; if he notices us, we’ll run immediately!
(thinks carefully about the opponent's situation) Thinking about it, there's no need to pick up a stone. Doing so might affect our performance. We can directly confront him to resolve the issue.
(thinks carefully about the opponent's situation) Let's forget it; going out to get the stone might increase our chances of being discovered. Better to stay hidden for now.
(thinks carefully about the opponent's situation) I’m Jiang Yin; I don't need a stone for defense. As long as I hide well, he definitely won't find me.

question: #question# How can Jiang Yin show that she's able to use the information she has to decisively make the decision to flee?

dialog.content: (Holding a stone and waiting for a long time, but nothing happens, she stands up and looks around) Hmm, strange, there seems to be no one here.
(Shouting loudly) Xiaobai! Xiaobai! Come out! Stop playing around, it's time to go home!
(Also stands up) Xiaobai? Who's Xiaobai? Could it be we've misunderstood, and this shadow wasn't following us?
(Picks up a little white dog) Finally caught up with you! Such a rascal! I won’t let you run around anymore!

No one was actually following Jiang Yin and Xiao Yun. It was just that Jiang Yin had seen a news report about a woman being followed on the bus, and with the streetlights on the small road broken, she scared herself into thinking someone was following them.
(After standing in place and pondering for a long time, chose a path opposite to where Jiang Yin was hiding) That little girl seemed to have gone that way, I’ll go check it out.
(Trembling behind the car) Jiang Yin, I'm scared. Will he come over?
(Squatting behind the car for so long his legs went numb, couldn’t help but stand up and peek out) Why hasn’t that guy made a move... Let me check, he seems to have left?
(Continues walking in the direction opposite to Jiang’s hiding spot) Where did they go? Damn it!
(Seeing the other person getting further and further away, immediately seizes the chance to escape) He’s gone! Let’s get out of here! Finally, we’ve shaken off this stalker!
Jiang Yin hid very well, and Heihua chose the wrong direction, thus the two managed to get rid of their pursuer—though she still doesn’t know who was following her.
